other_tests.findings: Baseline revealed oligoazoospermia (17.4 million/ml; normal >20), 55% sperm vitality, and reduced motility. After 3 months, sperm count increased to 23.1 million/ml, then decreased to 1.1 million/ml in the following 3 months. Motility reduced during treatment.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Sperm count improved initially then declined rapidly; sperm motility decreased further during treatment.

other_tests.findings: Bone density of the distal radius (left) was 52 mg/cm³ (normal range, 120–160) and lumbar spine was 0.971 g/cm² (normal range, >1.150) at baseline.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After 6 months of treatment, bone density increased to 83 mg/cm³ (distal radius) and 1.043 g/cm² (lumbar spine).

other_tests.findings: Baseline plasma glucose levels were normal, but insulin resistance was elevated.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Area under the curve for insulin and C-peptide levels decreased after 6 months of treatment.
